title: Rotational Motion - linear and angular velocity

content.description: A student is sitting in a seat in one of the cars as the ride rotates with a constant period. Which of the following correctly describes the linear and angular velocities of the student while passing point <math alttext="A" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi></math>?
content.question: Linear VelocityAngular VelocityAConstantChangingBConstantConstantCChangingChangingDChangingConstant

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
